answers.answer: Hello.Do you have diabetes? Though the pain of diabetic neuropathy does not manifest like your pain, it is still a possibility.Also, get your lower back checked for any disc protrusions. Do you take vitamins for any specific indication?Regards

question: In the middle of the night I jumped out of bed because of a sharptingling/pain in the bottom of my left heel. Pressing the heel on thefloor relieved the pain. It continued periodically, every 20 minutesor so. I am 78, in generally good health, exercise regularly, takelipator and various vitamins.
title: tingling pain in bottom of foot.
